entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 2:51 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.5°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 8.3°C
Wind: SSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature steady near 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
